effect.sun-moon: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.

short_effect.sun-moon: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
